title: Interpretation of the vision of running in a dream in detail according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html:
Interpretation of seeing running in a dream in detail according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq. In our next article, we will explain to you what is the interpretation of seeing running in a dream in detail according to the interpretation of Ya Ibn Shirin and Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of dreams to see running in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin mentioned that running in a dream in general has There are many interpretations, it can refer to the pursuit of sustenance, it can indicate fatigue and pressure, and it can symbolize things that concern insight, such as attention to appearance and exercise. If a man sees in a dream that he is running for fear that something will happen, then this vision It shows that he is running away from the responsibilities that fall on him, and the dream may indicate his inability to solve the problems he faces.
ZOE.
ZOE. In the case of running in a dream with a number of people, this vision means his participation in important occasions. If a man sees in his dream that he is running without any progress, then this vision indicates the presence of a major problem in his life that he cannot face and solve. Among the interpretations he mentioned Ibn Sirin said about running in a dream that if the dreamer is a legal beginner, then this vision for him symbolizes anxiety and tension in this matter. Interpretation of dreams to see running in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq mentioned that running in the event of a quarrel indicates the effort that the dreamer is making to earn money. Seeing running with confidence and skill indicates the fortuneteller’s ability in reality to bear the responsibilities assigned to him and his ability to overcome difficulties in reality. Among the symbols of running in a dream, it symbolizes anxiety about the future or achieving deferred goals in reality. Interpretation of a dream about seeing running in a dream for a woman Single If a single woman dreams that she was chasing a predatory animal, then this dream symbolizes strength and success. Whoever sees in her dream that she is running from a bull or a lion that is trying to catch up with her, this means that someone will approach her soon, and God knows best. If a single woman dreams that she is chasing a man If a married woman sees in her dream that she is running Quickly, this vision indicates the collapse of worries and the approach of comfort and happiness. Seeing a married woman running in her dream while feeling fear indicates distress and anxiety in reality and may indicate fear of illness or poverty, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about running in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees in her dream She is chasing a man, so this dream means that she will give birth to a male child, and God knows best. Seeing running in a dream generally indicates that you are approaching childbirth and making it easier. Seeing running in a dream for a pregnant woman is one of the good dreams that brings her good things in reality if she does not stumble during Running.All the previously mentioned interpretations and other interpretations mentioned in the dream interpretation books of many scholars are interpretations and

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing Surat Al-Ma’idah in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Ma’idah in a dream by Ibn Shirin and Al-Nabulsi. You can see: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a drum Interpretation of a dream about reading Surat Al-Ma’idah in a dream Nafi’ and Ibn Katheer said: Whoever recites it in a dream or something from it, or recites it to him, they will be generous in spirit and love to feed food. Rather, it was said: He has the right to offer certainty, loyalty, and dignity with the ruler to the people of his city. It was said that God answers his prayers, obtains good luck, and gives a reward equal to every Jew and Christian, and the unscrupulous are afflicted with it, and it is said that he obtains blessing and sustenance. Interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Ma’idah in a dream: Whoever reads it in a dream, or something from it Or read it to him, he benefits from Mufid and Ibn al-Adeed, and he honors the spirit and loves to feed himself. Rather, he was told to offer certainty, loyalty, and dignity with the ruler to the people of his city. His piety was good, and it was said: God answers his prayers, obtains good fortune, and gives the reward according to the number of each. Jew and Christian, and the unscrupulous are afflicted by it, and it is said that he receives blessing and food. Interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Ma’idah in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Ma’idah by Ibn Shirin: Whoever sees that he is reading it, his stature, strong certainty, and good piety. Interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Ma’idah in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi interpreted He dreamed of Surat Al-Ma’idah by saying: “Whoever recites it or has it recited to him.” As Nafi’ and Ibn Udayd said, he is generous in his soul, loves to feed himself with food. It was said: It is piety, worship and reverence, and it was said that it raises a person’s status and strengthens his certainty. He improves his piety, and God Almighty answers his prayers And he acquires wealth, and is rewarded according to the number of Jews and Christians. He is afflicted with a dry people, and he obtains blessings and food. Interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Ma’idah in the Millennium dream. He came to the pink millennium: And in the ladies there is an inheritance and women, and in a table of goodness and people who do not pray. A group of scholars who interpret dreams mentioned: Whoever reads Surat Al-Ma’idah in a dream, or something like that: He loves the generous soul of feeding food. Seeing Surat Al-Ma’idah in a dream is certainty, worship, and respect, and God, Blessed and Most High, knows best.

title: Interpretation of seeing guava in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Therefore, we will provide you with all the interpretations of this vision through the Shamloul website. Interpretation of seeing a guava in a dream. Seeing a guava in a dream may be one of the visions of many people.. one of the good visions that they carry for the monarch, it can be one of the hateful visions that bring evil, and among these interpretations If anyone sees a guava and it ends up on the tree in a dream, this indicates that he has obtained a lot of money, but from a forbidden source. Seeing a yellow guava tree in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be seriously ill in the near future. Seeing a guava on a tree in a dream indicates problems and crises that he will suffer. The dreamer in the near future. If one sees in his dream that he is holding a guava in his hand, it means that good news is coming and good luck to the fortuneteller in the near future. Seeing a guava in a dream indicates the wisdom of the priest in solving problems. Seeing a guava in a dream can mean the end of problems and judgments and the release of sadness and anguish in The coming period. If a person sees in his dream that he is eating, a rotten guava, this indicates that he is moving away from God and committing sins, disobedience, and loving lusts, and this vision serves as a warning to repent to God and turn away from God. Longing for love and sins. If you see yourself eating a rotten guava in a dream, this may indicate To the sadness that the dreamer feels. If one sees a guava fruit on a tree in a dream, this may indicate the arrival of an abundance of goodness and vitality in the coming season. Seeing a guava in a dream can indicate the good qualities that characterize the dreamer, such as: a good heart, and helping People, and that's why people love them. If one sees in a dream that someone is giving him a gift, a green guava, this indicates that the dreamer is getting a lot of money from a legitimate source. This vision can also indicate that this person loves him. The interpretation of seeing a guava in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of seeing a guava in a dream for an unmarried girl varies according to the details of the dream, and among these interpretations: Seeing a guava in a dream for an unmarried girl means that she will get a lot of money in the near future. If she dreams An unmarried girl says that she eats guava in a difficult way, as this indicates that a lot of good and abundant foods will arrive for her... but after exhaustion in the coming period. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is eating a yellow guava, this indicates that she will get sick in the coming period. Seeing empty guava From the seeds in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates the goodness and blessing that comes to her. Guava juice. In the dream of an unmarried girl, this indicates the good and happy news that she will receive in the coming period. If an unmarried girl sees guava in a dream, this indicates her marriage to a woman, a good man who loves her And it will bring her happiness soon.. This vision can also indicate a quiet life and the stable that she enjoys in her married life. If an unmarried girl dreams that there is a familiar person who gives her a guava and eats it, this indicates her marriage to that person.

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing a traffic accident in a dream

preview.html: Traffic accidents are among the most difficult moments that a person goes through, whether he is exposed to them personally or by someone close to him. Even if he saw them from afar, he was filled with fear and dread. So what is the interpretation of seeing a car accident in a dream?! We will discuss this in detail in the following lines. Seeing a car accident in a dream for a son Seeing a car accident in a dream The interpretation of seeing a car accident in a dream is one of the disturbing visions that portends bad luck. Sad changes in his life in the near future. The interpretation of seeing a car accident in a dream leads to conflict and strong competition in the work sector, which unfortunately ends with a loss of insight. Seeing a car accident indicates disagreements with relatives or friends, and seeing a car accident may predict that the dreamer will suffer from A major shock in his relationship with someone close to him. If the dreamer sees a car accident on an unpaved road full of bumps, this symbolizes the wrong actions he took in the recent period that led to loss. If the car lights are off, this indicates that the dreamer made decisions without adequate study, which causes him harm and harm. If the person who sees a traffic accident is not driving himself, and therefore being driven by another person, this is an indication that he is making some forced decisions against his will, which is causing him problems and difficulties. The car overturning in the vision symbolizes the reversal of circumstances in life and the loss of grace. If the car finally rests on its wheels, this indicates that the loss can be compensated for and stopped again, but if it rests on its back, this is a sign of a great loss that is difficult to compensate for. They can see the dreamer as a ray of hope, despite the fact that you saw a car accident. In a dream, if the dream ends with salvation, it is good that the crisis will end with minimal losses, but if the dreamer manages to avoid a collision, the dream is seen as a warning for him to be careful and monitor his actions. Seeing a car accident in a dream by Ibn SirinThe condition of the car reflects the dreamer’s circumstances in his life If he witnesses an accident that damages his car, this is a bad omen that will lead to conflicts and trials that he will soon experience. If the car overturns, this indicates a bad change in circumstances, as it symbolizes the presence of people in a circle of acquaintances who should not be trusted, as they mistreat him and exploit him for material interests. If the dream ends with the death of the dreamer, this is evidence that there was soon a way out of all these conflicts. An Egyptian website, the largest site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Website on Google and get the correct interpretations. Seeing a car accident in a dream for a single woman if He can see Single: A car accident occurred in her dream, and she was engaged or one of her relatives, indicates the presence of major disagreements with her partner that may end in separation, as expressed by seeing a car accident. In your dream, it is a warning to someone who is delving into her life badly. In the event of a car overturning in a dream, this indicates On the decisions you are wrong are not related and lead her to problems. The impulsive actions that you take in the dreamer create problems for her. But if

title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing gold and money in a dream

preview.html: Seeing gold and money in a dream: There is no doubt that seeing money and gold brings joy and happiness to the heart. For many, this vision is great and has positive connotations, but jurists have another opinion on this matter, as gold is not worthy of praise in most cases. Money is disliked by some jurists, and in this article we take a look at the psychological and jurisprudential effects of looking at gold and money in more detail and with a comprehensive explanation. What is the interpretation of a dream about gold and money in a dream? Seeing gold and money in a dream represents wealth, prosperity, and prosperity, and circumstances change for the better or for the worse. Depending on the dreamer’s condition. And whoever sees that he is collecting money and gold, this indicates fertility of thinking and carrying out large tasks and projects aimed at self-building, compensating for losses, and addressing defects. And if you see money and gold in his house, this indicates heavy worries and responsibilities, trust, and burdens that weigh him down, and he will benefit from them at the appropriate time. This vision is an indication of future ambitions and plans, high expectations, high ambitions, and an effort to reap wishes and revive hopes. Seeing gold and money in a dream by Ibn Sirin. In his interpretation of gold and money, Ibn Sirin goes to the meaning of the word and the form, so gold comes from peak, loss, and paradox, and it is yellow in color, which is an undesirable color. It is evidence of illness and envy, and money comes from hypocrisy, strife, and bankruptcy from money. Whoever sees gold and money, it shows the burdens of the world, the aggravation of debts, the abundance of disputes and fights, the succession of hardships, and entering into relationships and partnerships with fools deprived of chivalry and dignity. Gold is a sign of praise for a woman, her adornment, and evidence of marriage for unmarried people, and pregnancy for a married woman, and it is for a man in loss and loss, especially if he wears it, and the gold melts or dissolves. It is evidence of cold rivalry and long conflict. From another angle, gold and money in a dream are evidence of illusions and mirages, indulging in this world, following desires, thinking about transient matters, forgetting the afterlife, and the necessity of returning to guidance before it is too late. Seeing gold and money in a dream Single women: Gold and money for single people is evidence of happiness, spaciousness, comfort, and marriage in the near future, removing obstacles from one’s path, and renewing hopes after severe despair. Wearing gold is evidence of commitment and a blessed life, and finding gold and money is evidence of prosperity, fertility, and relief from worry and distress. And if she sees someone stealing gold And money, this indicates someone who is jealous of her and angry with her, and robs her of her solace and stability and what occupies her mind. And if you see that she is taking gold or throwing money at herself, this indicates the loss of opportunities, the waste of the offers presented to her, and the pursuit of her worries and sorrows. Seeing gold and money in a married woman’s dream Money and Gold They indicate the responsibilities and duties assigned to him, the heavy burdens and personal obligations, and the ability to fulfill what is assigned to him without negligence. Gold in a dream indicates prosperity, happiness, bliss, prosperity, and adornment, while finding money and gold is evidence of calming the situation and alleviating the situation.
preview.text: Seeing gold and money in a dream: There is no doubt that seeing money and gold brings joy and happiness to the heart. For many, this vision is great and has positive connotations, but jurists have another opinion on this matter, as gold is not worthy of praise in most cases. Money is disliked by some jurists, and in this article we take a look at the psychological and jurisprudential effects of looking at gold and money in more detail and with a comprehensive explanation. What is the interpretation of a dream about gold and money in a dream? Seeing gold and money in a dream represents wealth, prosperity, and prosperity, and circumstances change for the better or for the worse. Depending on the dreamer’s condition. And whoever sees that he is collecting money and gold, this indicates fertility of thinking and carrying out large tasks and projects aimed at self-building, compensating for losses, and addressing defects. And if you see money and gold in his house, this indicates heavy worries and responsibilities, trust, and burdens that weigh him down, and he will benefit from them at the appropriate time. This vision is an indication of future ambitions and plans, high expectations, high ambitions, and an effort to reap wishes and revive hopes. Seeing gold and money in a dream by Ibn Sirin. In his interpretation of gold and money, Ibn Sirin goes to the meaning of the word and the form, so gold comes from peak, loss, and paradox, and it is yellow in color, which is an undesirable color. It is evidence of illness and envy, and money comes from hypocrisy, strife, and bankruptcy from money. Whoever sees gold and money, it shows the burdens of the world, the aggravation of debts, the abundance of disputes and fights, the succession of hardships, and entering into relationships and partnerships with fools deprived of chivalry and dignity. Gold is a sign of praise for a woman, her adornment, and evidence of marriage for unmarried people, and pregnancy for a married woman, and it is for a man in loss and loss, especially if he wears it, and the gold melts or dissolves. It is evidence of cold rivalry and long conflict. title: Interpretation of a toilet in a dream: Seeing a bathroom or entering a toilet in a dream

preview.html: When you enter a clean, dirty, or soiled toilet, or when you clean it, a chair emerges for pregnant women, married women, and single women, according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, al-Nabulsi, and others. Toilet Seeing a toilet in a dream is one of the dreams that has many meanings and great and important evidence that comes to the dreamer, and it is something that he must be fully aware of. , where we see that we sit on the toilet to relieve the need. Or we stand in front of the toilet and in various other forms that may appear to us in the dream. Toilets are among the impure places in which it is forbidden for us to mention God Almighty because we defecate in it. We will explain to you the interpretation of seeing a toilet in a dream by the great researcher Ibn Shaheen, as he interpreted it completely and comprehensively for all people, Which can be obtained by knowing the details of the dream. Interpretation of defecating and entering the bathroom in a dream: Defecating in a dream symbolizes getting rid of worries, sorrows, pain, and healing, because in reality it is relief from the feces or urine from the body that disturbed the person and he threw it into the toilet or the toilet designated for that. As for bathing and ablution, it may indicate purity from sins and disobedience, and in other sayings it indicates sustenance and good deeds for one who practices his religion, or an indication of the necessity of repentance for one who commits sins and transgressions. Interpretation of entering the toilet or defecating in a dreamWhen the dreamer enters the toilet and leaves without relieving himself, This indicates his personal problems that will change in his life. If he is single, it is permissible for him to get married, because the toilet is a place for revealing one’s private parts, in which it is permissible to marry. She is pregnant or married, this indicates that she knows the path that leads her to happiness, and if a person enters the toilet and the person comes out frowning and unhappy without relieving the need, then this is the emergence of sadness and anxiety and bringing sadness to the next stage of his life. And in the event that you see a man or woman He knows that he is turning away from religion and cutting off his prayers or issuing a fatwa to himself about what to do, then he sees the toilet without urinating, defecating, or flushing. Heresy and impurity are what he does and the sins that accumulate on his shoulder, including those related to places where prayer is not permissible, and the prohibition of having sex with the opposite sex, whether that is through touching, flirting, or adultery. Interpretation of a clean or dirty toilet in a dream A clean toilet that a person enters And he sees its shine, or likes its cleanliness, or does not see dirt in it, then it indicates the disappearance of worries and sorrows and relief for the afflicted, and it is also interpreted as healing for the sick and profit for the merchant. Some say that it is evidence of forgiveness and the removal of sins because dirt was fleeting. As for bathing in a pure bath, it is either forgiveness of sins or repentance and cleansing of the soul from sins and a return to religion through sincere repentance, and it is said that it is a sum of money to be spent. Easily or spend it easily, and the more pleasant and clean the smell of the toilet, the greater the goodness and happiness in its meaning. In the case of a toilet that is dirty or full of filth, or whose walls are contaminated with feces, and water is spread in it and repulsive insects swarm in it, or it has an unpleasant odor, this indicates bad bad deeds. The married man has a choice

Interpretation of a clean or dirty toilet in a dream A clean toilet that a person enters and sees its shine, or loves its cleanliness, or does not see dirt in it, then it indicates the disappearance of worries and sorrows and relief for the afflicted, and it is also interpreted as healing for the patient and profit for the merchant. In the case of a dirty toilet or full of filth, or its walls are contaminated with feces, and water spreads in it and hateful insects buzz in it, or it has a bad smell, this indicates the evil of bad deeds, for a married man to choose

title: Interpretation of children’s teeth in a dream Children’s teeth in a dream

preview.html: A dream about a child’s teeth indicates the success of plans and the fulfillment of ambitions, and other interpretations such as the fall of children’s teeth and the appearance of teeth for a child who has teeth. I see my young son’s teeth. I see a newborn with teeth. My daughter dreamed of having teeth, or my daughter’s teeth falling out. We will interpret it for the unmarried, for the married. For a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, according to a man from Ibn Sirin and others in the continuation of the title: Interpretation of baby teeth in a dream. Symbol of baby teeth in a dream for family and relatives. While seeing baby teeth falling out in a dream, if the upper teeth indicate the arrival of good things in the dreamer’s life and the improvement of his financial conditions in reality. Regarding the falling of baby teeth in a dream. A dream is considered an unfavorable dream, indicating death and failure. A vision can also indicate death or life, depending on the details contained in it. Baby teeth in a dream indicate the financial situation of the dreamer. If the dreamer sees in a dream that baby teeth are present only in the upper jaw, then the dream shows Male family members. As for the teeth in the lower jaw, they symbolize female family members. Seeing a child’s tooth in a dream means a grandfather. The appearance of four teeth on the upper jaw in a dream indicates cousins, while the four teeth in the lower part indicate cousins. As for The dog symbolizes the owner and master of the house. The movement of a child’s teeth in a dream warns of the illness of one of his relatives. The falling of a child’s teeth in a dream is not considered a praiseworthy vision, because it indicates the death of one of the dreamer’s relatives. In a dream, the whiteness of shiny teeth is a sign of goodness, living, and success. If you see In a dream, the golden teeth of a child, the dreamer expects a fire in his home. Regarding the black teeth of a child in a dream, this means that the dreamer will soon face many misfortunes. Interpretation of baby teeth in a dream Seeing new teeth appearing in an infant’s mouth in a dream promises that the priest will be able to fulfill his desires and implement his plans that he dreams Implementing it in his real life. For a newly married woman, seeing new teeth in an infant’s mouth indicates that she will give birth to a boy. If a mother sees new teeth appearing in her child’s mouth, the dream foretells that she will become pregnant again. According to dream interpreters, the appearance of new teeth in the upper jaw of an infant means that the woman is waiting for a boy, while the appearance of new teeth in the lower jaw symbolizes that she has a baby girl. Happiness, kindness and good luck are the meanings of seeing new white teeth in the infant’s mouth. If the teeth The new ones coming out of the baby’s mouth are damaged and black, which means that the dream is a sign of hatred and unhappiness. Interpretation of baby teeth in a dream: Seeing baby teeth in a dream in the baby’s mouth means that the dreamer will be able to achieve his goals and desires that he wished would come true. For a married woman who sees baby teeth A child in a dream, the vision is a sign of the imminent birth of a child. A mother who sees that her child has teeth, the vision indicates the approaching pregnancy with a new baby, and if the teeth

A mother who sees that her child has teeth, the vision indicates the approaching pregnancy with a new baby, and if the teeth

title: Seeing cockroaches and ants in a dream by Ibn Sirin and seeing flying cockroaches in a dream

preview.html: Which - seeing cockroaches and ants in a dream makes the dreamer live in anxiety and tension because they are insects that have no benefit in reality, but we find that ants herald good meanings from God, unlike cockroaches, and this vision carries important warnings that must be taken into account. Upon vision, scholars gathered to interpret this dream so that the dreamer would know the good and evil of seeing it, and understand the messages explained by the majority of scholars. Seeing cockroaches and ants in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing ants and cockroaches in a dream? Which - whichInterpretation of seeing cockroaches in a dreamIt leads to worries, as seeing them in reality It causes disgust, so it is not desirable to have it anywhere, so the vision is a warning about the necessity of paying attention to prayer and not neglecting it no matter what happens. To dream of cockroaches indicates that there are enemies around the dreamer and he must be careful not to approach or talk to them. If he catches these cockroaches in a dream, this indicates their inability to harm him no matter what happens. Cockroaches emerging from the aquarium tempt betrayal and deceit near the fortuneteller, and here he must be more rational and careful in his actions so as not to fall into this betrayal. And about seeing ants, it is good news for the dreamer. To achieve his wonderful goals that will make his next life happy. However, if the ants are large in the dream, this leads to exposure to a major problem that hinders the dreamer’s life, and if he does not try to solve it properly, he will not be able to get out of it. The exit of ants from the place is not a good omen, as it leads To distress and harm to the dreamer, but this anxiety can be removed by repeatedly mentioning God and avoiding any action that angers him. What is the interpretation of seeing cockroaches and ants in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Our imam Ibn Sirin believes that there is a difference between seeing ants and cockroaches, so we find ants worthy of praise in a dream. It removes evil from the dreamer. Killing cockroaches is one of the happiest dreams that promises the dreamer that he will get rid of all his worries and sorrows and will not suffer from anguish in his coming days. Cockroaches enter into the envy inherent in the dreamer, and this negatively affects his behavior and behavior, but he must adhere to reading the Qur’an and dhikr, Neither magic nor envy affects him. Seeing ants is evidence of an abundance of money, work, and a quiet life full of joy, unaffected by any sadness. Perhaps seeing ants expresses that the dreamer does not act decisively on the most important issues and this does not help, so he needs to learn to be more personal. And stronger than before. Also, seeing ants is an important indicator that the dreamer’s life is changing for the better, and this is because he faces optimism in life and seeks to reach happiness. Enter the Egyptian dream interpretation website from Google, and you will find all the dream interpretations you are looking for. Seeing cockroaches and ants in a single woman’s dream indicates a vision A single woman refers to her good and innocent relationships with everyone around her. He does not face arrogance and vanity, but rather lives with happiness and contentment. If she sees ants above her bed, this foretells her marriage, which is very close, and her happiness in a peaceful life full of stability, warmth, and an increase in money. Seeing ants is an expression of the happiness she sees in her neighborhood.

title: Interpretation of a dream about lead by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about bullets: Many people worry about seeing bullets in a dream, because they believe that this dream indicates death and that the interpretation is incorrect. Dreaming of being wounded by a bullet, we will also explain to you the interpretation of a dream of death by a bullet, and if the interpretation differs if the bullet was fired into the air. This is what we will learn in this article. Interpretation of a dream about bullets When someone sees that he has been shot in a dream, it may mean that someone is talking bad things about him and he will hear them himself. Interpretation of a dream about bullets in a dream could be a sign that the dreamer is An authoritarian person with a hard heart. If someone sees in a dream that he is shooting his acquaintances and friends, this may be a sign that he wants to break off the relationship between them. Seeing a shooting in a place of mourning or the funeral of a dead person can lead to hearing a lot of news that exposes the dreamer To sadness and despair. If a person shoots himself in a dream, this may be a sign that his psychological state will get worse and he may think about killing himself many times and he should not think about it at all and get closer to God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about bullets by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that bullets In a dream, it can be a sign of making a new decision from which the dreamer can never return. If the dreamer sees in a dream that bullets have been shot at him, it could mean that the person is hated and hated by those close to him. When the dreamer sees in a dream that someone is shooting Accordingly, this is a sign that someone is jealous of the fortuneteller. Interpretation of a dream about bullets fired by Ibn Sirin in a dream could be an indication that the dreamer is a weak and selfish person who only thinks about himself. Seeing gunshots in a dream can symbolize depression and despair. Which the dreamer is suffering from. Interpretation of a dream of single women being shot When a girl sees that she is shooting someone in a dream, this may indicate revenge for the injustice she suffered. Seeing the interpretation of a dream of shooting an unmarried girl can be a sign that she will meet a bad person He will speak wrongly about her. If a girl sees that bullets are falling on her and she does not know who shot her, this means that she will hear a lot of shocking and sad news. The interpretation of a single girl’s dream of bullets could be a sign that she is living a period full of tension, anxiety, and fear that something will happen. If the dreamer shoots her partner, this may mean that she will remain permanently away from him without returning to him again. Interpretation of a married woman’s dream of bullets: When a married woman sees that her husband has shot her, this may mean that her husband will divorce her permanently, and that she does not feel With stability and security. If the dreamer sees that he is shooting at the husband’s family, this symbolizes the emergence of disagreements and problems with them. Interpretation of a woman’s dream of bullets may indicate that her life is unstable at that time and this confirms the presence of some problems and disagreements with her husband. Seeing a married woman shooting outside The house means that she is trying to get rid of her worries, and if she releases the house
